originalText.text: I changed my review considering that this place has stepped there game up on the staff being more professional and courteous. Dr April McNeil is a great doctor. And the young Spanish guy who works the front desk is very professional and courteous. This place use to be mad ghetto in my fabolous voice. They have improved on wait times and courteousness.

text.text: I changed my review considering that this place has stepped there game up on the staff being more professional and courteous. Dr April McNeil is a great doctor. And the young Spanish guy who works the front desk is very professional and courteous. This place use to be mad ghetto in my fabolous voice. They have improved on wait times and courteousness.

originalText.text: Nice doctors, but some of the administrative staff are unprofessional.  This clinic does deal with some difficult patients who can be a challenge, but the dealing with some staff members can be a challenge as well. If you call for an appointment, you are likely to be transferred to voicemail, and eight of out of ten times no one will return your call. Or worse, if you do get someone on the phone, they will put you on hold and never get back to you. I've had to make several trips to the clinic itself just to make an appointment for my elderly parent who refuses to switch doctors.

originalText.text: Excellent healthcare providers but the worst administrators I've ever encountered. None of the people running Citicare have any concern about the patients and community they serve. Many of the phone numbers listed have been disconnected, the numbers that work all have full voicemail boxes and none of the top administrators answer email (I ran a test by emailing each one separately).

text.text: Excellent healthcare providers but the worst administrators I've ever encountered. None of the people running Citicare have any concern about the patients and community they serve. Many of the phone numbers listed have been disconnected, the numbers that work all have full voicemail boxes and none of the top administrators answer email (I ran a test by emailing each one separately).

originalText.text: I've been going to CitiCARE since Dec. 14, 2018. Besides having WAY too many appointments made for follow-ups, and the nurse and Dr.'s assistants ask the same computer questions, which get longer every time you answer yes, and the long wait time to see the Doctor and his assistant is unfathomable. However they are thorough and so far I am getting what I need.

originalText.text: Horrific place. I called for 3 weeks straight at different times trying to get someone on the phone. I finally had to walk in there to reschedule an appointment for my mom. While I was in the waiting room I called to see why they weren't answering the phones and saw that they were just sitting around using their cellphones and hangout while the office phone rang. I'm definitely going to try and find a different place to take my mom.
